eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Minnesota; AT 08:42 PM ON OCT 01, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 09:42 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a coordinated test of the Emergency Alert System in cooperation with the local broadcasters. This is only a test. This test is from the Minnesota Bureau of Criminal Apprehension. No action is needed. This is only a test.
